landing.hero_subtitle: GranStocks Analytics is a deterministic trading intelligence platform. We combine real-time quantitative screening, institutional-grade risk metrics, and multi-model AI synthesis to keep you ahead of the market.

market_overview.title: Market Overview
market_overview.desc: A unified dashboard displaying your most critical tracked assets, daily performance, and market consensus at a glance.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Tracking
portfolio.desc: Monitor your active holdings with real-time P&L calculations, cost basis tracking, and deterministic risk analysis.

watchlists.title: Watchlists & Universes
watchlists.desc: Organize massive lists of correlated assets into Universes for batch screening, comparative analysis, and sector tracking.

screener.title: Background Screener
screener.desc: No hardcoded lists. Our background job runner continuously processes entire Universes to find the absolute best candidates based on math.

ai.title: AI Narratives & Firm View
ai.desc: Generate Technical, Fundamental, and Risk narratives strictly from deterministic data. Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) for OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepSeek, and more.

admin.title: Zero-Trust Admin Dashboard
admin.desc: Complete enterprise-grade user management, invite code systems, and Role-Based Access Control protected behind Fastify middleware.

landing.footer: GranStocks Analytics. Built for advanced market researchers.

dashboard.title: Overview Dashboard
dashboard.no_assets_desc: Go to Watchlists to add symbols to your portfolio.

screener.title: Best Candidates
screener.subtitle: 6M Screener
screener.desc: Aggregating deterministic signals (Return, Volatility, Drawdown, Trend Strategy).

run_state.running: Job currently running. Live metrics are calculating...
run_state.running_desc: Screener jobs usually resolve within 14-45 seconds depending on exchange latencies.

providers.title: LLM Providers
providers.desc: Configure your Bring-Your-Own-Key (BYOK) language models here.

analysis.title: Analysis Weights
analysis.desc: Configure the deterministic weights used for technical scoring.

prompts.title: Prompt Templates
prompts.desc: Customize the prompts used to generate AI narratives.
prompts.disclaimer_body: Action labels are simulated and not financial advice.

demo.warning: DEMO MODE: Static snapshot locked on January 1, 2026. Data is completely offline.
